Triply.kr

Project Title

Green Pineapple

Role

The pineapple is made up of mostly water (86%) and carbohydrates (13%), with almost no fat or protein. It has nutrients, vitamins, and minerals, including copper, potassium, calcium, magnesium, manganese, vitamin C, thiamin, B6, beta-carotene, and folate as well as soluble and insoluble fiber and bromelain.

Technologies

HTML, CSS, Boostrap, Sass, JavaScript, jQuery, Jekyll

Agency

Green Pineapple Co

Year

2017
